title: 5-stars to budget chain, hospitality industry flocks to Ayodhya to open new hotels
description: With the state government focusing on creating good infrastructure to connect Ayodhya with main cities like Lucknow and Gorakhpur and other major economic centres, hospitality industry players feel that the city will attract more tourists across all segments thereby providing opportunity to operate hotels at different price points, from budget to luxury, to cater to different segments of the market.
